name: Tassilo's Quest DEMO Beta
description:
This is the Tassilo's Quest DEMO Prototype!

Tassilo's Quest is a 2D platformer developed by Tassilo59 and co-developed by Daxternator_2117. Inspired by classic platformers such as Mario and Sonic, Tassilo's Quest involves you running, swimming (and sometimes flying) through various locales, collecting crystals based of the 7 magical powers, and taking the fight to King Tutti Frutti's Moon Base to stop him once and for all and save the land.

The final version of the game will feature 8 traditional platforming stages, each separated into 3 individual acts and 2 boss fights; 2 bonus shoot 'em up style stages; 4 playable characters, and more!

Programmer, Graphics, Designer: Tassilo59
Composer, Sound Designer: Daxternator_2117

It is not recommended to play the web version due to performance issues, music bugs, and having less frequent updates than the Windows version.

(Due to being developed on Windows, the Windows zip file is the one that is updated most frequently)

The most up to date right now is: Windows Version and Web Version!
